p: On August 26, 2015, a 15-year old male student developed a case of ARI, with a peak body temperature of 38.4 °C. By August 31, a total of 12 male students were infected. No females were infected. The mean age of the infected students was 15.4 years (median, 15 years; range, 14–17 years). The distribution of daily cases is shown in Fig. 1 . Reported students were from the same class but living in six different dormitory rooms. The outbreak lasted for 6 days.
